author: wadaghana
title: Cardano Care
description: The plastic recycling industry in Accra - Ghana suffers from an antiquated reputation model and little use of helpful technology.
solution: A marketplace with certified plastic recycling companies, financial guarantees via Plutus, and convenient technology for recycling process.
experience: Wada: Skilled team of Cardano Community practitioners, entrepreneurs and developers located in hubs across Africa and the diaspora.
